<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H8631|תְּקֵף]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקֵף‎</span>] **verb** ==prevail over, overpower== (late; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaism; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּקֵיף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be strong***; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תקף‎</span> ***authority***; compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xlvii (1893), 102</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תקף‎</span> ***overpower*** SabDenkm<sup>No.9.l.13</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***attain to, overtake, overpower***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect:*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְקְפוֺ‎</span> [[Eccl.4.12|Eccl 4:12]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:60d»§ 60d</sup>) if ***one overpower him***, so 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְקְפֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Job.14.20|Job 14:20]] 3 feminine singular suffix ***id.*** [[Job.15.24|Job 15:24]].
